'Monolaurin', also known as 'glycerol monolaurate', 'glyceryl laurate' or '1-Lauroyl-rac-
glycerol', is a monoglyceride. It is the mono-ester formed from glycerol and
lauric acid. Its chemical formula is C 15 H30 O4 .
